sentences.english: I was senseless and ignorant; I was a brute beast before you.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣愚昧無知，在你面前如畜類一般。

sentences.english: So foolish was I, and ignorant: I was as a beast before thee.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣愚昧無知，在你面前如畜類一般。

sentences.english: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
sentences.chinese: 畜類人不曉得，愚頑人也不明白。

sentences.english: The senseless man does not know, fools do not understand
sentences.chinese: 畜類人不曉得，愚頑人也不明白。
